Posts.Content: Hi, My name is Eileen  I am a 73 yr old lady in excellent health.Had my first mammogram in many years-showed a lump that required more test-had an ultrasound yesterday-radiologist says the lump is highly suspecious for ca. she said she felt a lump,however I cannot feel a lump.My breast is sore from me poking trying to feel the lump..My PCP has scheduled me to see a surgeon on monday.  I am terrified..I have no pain,my weight is stable,the breast color has not changed, no family history of breast ca..I live alone I have no children,my husband passed away in Feb 2010 from a 4 year battle with pancreatic cancer.It was horrible. Don't know if I can handle it if it is cancer..My nerves are shattered.. I would appreciate any advice..  Many thanks
Posts.Title: ultrasound shows highly suspecious lump
